charinfo.name: Umino Iruka
charinfo.description: An instructor for Konoha, Iruka is a caring man who has acted like something of a father and mentor to Naruto throughout his youth. Iruka fights with his allies in mind, preferring to protect them and help them as support.

abilities.name: Shuriken Throw
abilities.description: Iruka throws a shuriken, dealing 20 damage to one enemy, and an additional 10 damage for each 25 health Iruka has lost.

abilities.name: Ally Shield
abilities.description: Using himself as a shield, Iruka makes one ally invulnerable for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Sealed Bomb Square Release
abilities.description: Iruka sets a trap. The following turn, if one enemy uses a new harmful skill, they will receive 40 damage that ignores invulnerability and for 1 turn, will receive an additional 25 damage from physical and chakra skills. This skill is invisible.

abilities.name: Iruka Parry
abilities.description: This skill makes Umino Iruka invulnerable for 1 turn.
